database._comment_connectionTimeout: Maximum time (in milliseconds) that the driver will wait for a connection to be established. If a connection cannot be established within this time, an error will be thrown. The default value is 15000 ms (15 seconds)
database._comment_requestTimeout: Maximum time (in milliseconds) to wait for a query to complete. If a query takes longer than this time, it will be canceled, and an error will be returned. The default value is also 15000 ms (15 seconds)

options._comment_encrypt: true|false|strict Set to true for Azure SQL

btpi._comment_interval: Cron format for scheduling the BTPi queries. This example runs every 30 minutes from 8 AM to 5 PM, Monday to Friday. See also https://crontab.guru/ for help with cron syntax
btpi._comment_connectionTimeout: Maximum time (in milliseconds) that the app will wait for a connection to be established.
btpi._comment_JSONSpaces: Number of spaces to use for JSON pretty-printing in log files. Set to 0 (default) to minify

wms_proxy._comment_info: Host values should include protocol (e.g., http|s:) and port (e.g., :8702) as needed
wms_proxy._comment_pulse: Host ip and port for the WMS Pulse instance. Only the server address and port are needed (e.g., do not include /Pulse/Query/runQuery here)
wms_proxy._comment_xmlep: Host ip and port for the WMS QlikView (XML) endpoints
